flawed_nl_solution:
After the 100 people leave, there will be 300-100 = <<300-100=170>>170 people left.
The 170 people will eat 170/300 = 170/300 as much food as the original group of people in the castle.
The 60 days' worth of food will last this smaller group for 60 days / (170/300) = <<60/(170/300)=1800/17>>1800/17 more days.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 170. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
